decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (DPA-69799-03 Revision  A, received 13/03/2014, MBSK140404-1, received 04/04/2014, Unnumbered Design & Access Statement, 1127/PL.01, revision 26/04/2014, 1127/PL.02 Revision A, 1127/PL.04 Revision A, received 27/04/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces including the wall, fencing, pedestrian and vehicular gates of the hereby permitted scheme have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - All hard and soft landscape works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.  The works shall be carried out prior to the use of any part of the development or in accordance with the programme agreed with the local planning authority
Condition : 5 - The crossover will be constructed to a maximum width of 3.6m
Condition : 6 - The existing vehicle crossover must be reinstated prior to the completion of the approved works and at no time must there be two vehicle crossovers in use at the property.
description: Demolition of existing double garage and hard standing to Grove Park Road; relocation of crossover; relocation of off street parking, new vehicle gate and vehicular access along Grove Park Road; relocation of pedestrian access on Hartington Road.
